bioconda.name: bioconductor-clipper
bioconda.summary: Gene Set Analysis Exploiting Pathway Topology

biotools.summary: This tool is for topological gene set analysis. It implements a two-step empirical approach based on the exploitation of graph decomposition into a junction tree to reconstruct the most relevant signal path.

bioschemas.name: clipper
bioschemas.summary: This tool is for topological gene set analysis. It implements a two-step empirical approach based on the exploitation of graph decomposition into a junction tree to reconstruct the most relevant signal path.
